name: Dusk (itch) (LoudEyes)
description:
Use the left and right arrow keys to move and the space bar to jump.

Join Dusk on an endless adventure to discover the secrets of the forest in this endless  side scrolling platformer.

Along the way, you’ll collect fireflies, find power ups – all while uncovering the forest's mysteries.

The game is currently in development with regular updates planned for the future.

Also available as a free download on the playstore.
